entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 07:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: S 11 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Snow level 700 metres lowering to near valley bottom late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Snow level near valley bottom. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
